projects.title: Eminence Projectiles Logo Design
projects.body: A logo designed for the projectile manufacturing company Eminence Projectiles.

projects.title: Four Card Feature
projects.body: A Front End Mentor challenge, bare HTML markup is given along with some designs, leaving it up to you to complete the styling.

projects.title: Simon Says Game
projects.body: (Volume warning!) A simple memory game made with javascript, remember and click the buttons in order. (Note: Mobile touch yet to be implemented)

projects.title: Tindog
projects.body: A mockup of tinder for dogs.

projects.title: Studio Ghibli Films
projects.body: Learning to interact with APIs. Displays all films from the Studio Ghibli API.

projects.title: Fylo Landing Page
projects.body: A Front End Mentor challenge, bare HTML markup is given along with some designs, leaving it up to you to complete the styling.

projects.title: Social Media Dashboard
projects.body: A Front End mentor challenge to create a social media dashboard with switchable light and dark modes.
